SELECT ai.id, ai.user_id AS userId, ai.images, ai.create_date AS createDate, ai.audit_status AS auditStatus, ai.status_date AS statusDate, ai.introduction, ai.tag, ui.user_name AS userName, ui.avatar FROM audit_info ai LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = ai.user_id ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND ai.audit_status = #{auditInfo.auditStatus}
AND ui.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{auditInfo.userName},'%')
ORDER BY ai.create_date DESC
